name: product_promotion_6
description: Promotional post template for Orchid featuring a baby image, bold headline, and CTA button.

samples.heading: Baby Care Essentials
samples.subheading: Gentle and safe products for your little one

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: Create a detailed prompt for a soft, pastel-colored background image. Include specific details about colors, patterns, and composition. For best results, specify a subtle pattern or gradient that complements baby products (e.g., soft blues, pinks, or yellows) and creates a gentle, nurturing atmosphere.
fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality image of the business product. Include specific details about lighting, composition, and styling. The image should be well-lit, professional, and evoke warmth and care. For best results, specify an image with a transparent background or a clean, uncluttered background that showcases the product effectively.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your company logo with transparent background (PNG format). For best results, use a high-resolution image that represents your baby care brand effectively. Ensure it's clear, recognizable, and builds trust with parents.
fieldPrompt.heading: Write a short, engaging heading for baby products (max 25 characters) that appeals to parents and caregivers. Examples: Gentle Care for Little Ones, Baby's Happy Skin, Safe & Natural. Focus on trust, safety, and care.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Craft a brief description of your baby care products (max 100 characters) that highlights safety and quality. Examples: Hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested for your baby's delicate skin, Gentle formulas designed for sensitive skin. Focus on what matters most to parents.
fieldPrompt.button_text: Create a clear call-to-action (max 20 characters) that encourages parents to take action. Examples: Shop Now, Learn More, See Collection, Try Today. Make it reassuring and action-oriented.
